---
title: Conway-Maxwell-Poisson models
---

CMP models are models of count data.

Model:

$$
P(X = x) = \frac{\lambda^x}{(x!)^\nu Z(\lambda, \nu)}
$$

# Description

This is based on [@meyerNonWeaklyInformativePriors2023].
